sentence.Network_en: He was free from all sycophancy or obsequiousness in the face of the reactionary ruling class.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在反动统治阶级面前没有丝毫的奴颜与媚骨.

sentence.Network_en: Sycophancy was the device of the least trustworthy.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿谀奉承之辈最不可靠.

sentence.Network_en: What weakness is it that you can never tolerate? --- Sycophancy and servile flattery.
sentence.Network_cn: 你最不能容忍的缺点是什么? ---- 奴颜婢膝.

PerfectNetExp.abs: sycee 银锭sycophancy 拍马屁sycophant 奉承者
sycon 隐头果, sycophancy 献媚, sycon 隐头花序

list.abs: A sycophant ; a parasite ., 钻营拍马的人 ; 食客.
英语骂人话_蔡勇_新浪博客 ... swine 猪，卑贱的人 sycophant 马屁精 thug 暴徒，凶手.
《Friends》词汇表B ... Genen. 吉恩（男子名） sycophant n. 拍马屁的人, 谄媚者, 奉承者 frilly adj. 镶褶边的.
sycophant中文 ... 奉承者/ flatterer/lickspittle/sycophant / - crafty sycophant 奸佞; - TSycophant 英国蓝调摇滚.

entry.def: Sycophancy is the quality or action of being sycophantic.

auth_sentence.content: Securing further promotion was a Machiavellian exercise demanding paroxysms of sycophancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Securing further promotion was a Machiavellian exercise demanding paroxysms of sycophancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Securing further promotion was a Machiavellian exercise demanding paroxysms of sycophancy.

auth_sentence.content: Sycophancy, the abject acclamation and supine worship that surrounded him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sycophancy, the abject acclamation and supine worship that surrounded him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sycophancy, the abject acclamation and supine worship that surrounded him.

auth_sentence.content: For you to see it as anything more important is to indulge in craven sycophancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: For you to see it as anything more important is to indulge in craven sycophancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For you to see it as anything more important is to indulge in craven sycophancy.
